dmca.title: [EV1-C2027149X] DFL AV Infringement 2006/07 NRID13983
dmca.body:
Dear Sirs,

Please see the page here - http://vilan.altervista.org/calcio.htm the
information provided enables users to view illegal streams of our client's
sports. 

Regards,

Tim

-----Original Message-----
From: DMCA [mailto:dmca@theplanet.com] 
Sent: 04 December 2006 16:49
To: TimC@nr-online.com
Cc: Theplanet@chillingeffects.org
Subject: FW: [EV1-C2027149X] DFL AV Infringement 2006/07 NRID13983

 We are unable to locate on the web page in question any of the material
that you claim is being infringed as of 10:41:32 a.m. (GMT-6).

Legal Response Team
ThePlanet.com 


-----Original Message-----

MIME element (text/plain)
Dear Sirs  
 
Die Liga - Fussballverband e. V. (Ligaverband) has the exclusive right
to commercially exploit all matches within the Bundesliga including, but
not limited to, all moving images and other audio/video content. The DFL
Deutsche Fussball Liga GmbH (DFL) operates on behalf of the Ligaverband.
Ligaverband and DFL are referred to in the following as The Bundesliga. 
 
We have noticed that your Web Site http://vilan.altervista.org is
displaying and/or offering Bundesliga's audio visual content. 
 
As you have neither sought nor obtained permission from The Bundesliga
to use this content, your present use is an infringement of The
Bundesliga's rights.  
 
Please immediately cease all such infringements on any and all of your
web sites and confirm to us via email that you have done so. 
 
Nothing in this letter is intended or shall be construed to constitute
an express or implied waiver of any of The Bundesliga's rights or
remedies, including any rights or remedies in respect of infringement
not explicitly stated, whether current or in the future, all of which
are expressly reserved. 
 
Formal Declaration 
 
I hereby state that The Bundesliga is the owner of the exclusive rights
referenced above and that NetResult is authorised to act on its behalf
with respect to internet monitoring and compliance. On behalf of The
Bundesliga I hereby state that I have a good faith belief that use of
the content in the manner complained of is not authorised by The
Bundesliga, its agents, or the law. 
 
Yours sincerely, 
 
Tim Cooper
NetResult 
 
A Division of Projector NetResult Ltd
Mulberry House
583 Fulham Road
London
UK SW6 5UA
Tel: +44 (0)20 7471 1730
Head Office: Projector NetResult Ltd, 8 Wye Street, Hereford, UK HR2 7RB
